name: Alt Multitask
description:
Minigame instructions from left to right, top to bottom:

Minigame 1:

Hit the keys displayed, every few seconds they'll be randomized

Minigame 2:

Kill the fly using the keypad numbers within 5 seconds

Minigame 3:

Get the guy to the opposing end using the Home or End keys within 5 seconds

Minigame 4:

Press, within 5 seconds, and hold the key displayed (the ones on the left side of your keyboard), it'll be randomized every few seconds
